segments.text: I see the sink running full blast—wait, it's overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over the edge; how did that happen so fast?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle—surprising she hasn't felt it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar—didn't expect that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling; I'm shocked it's holding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister has her hand up, like she's in on the secret raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open wide, full of cookies—such a tempting surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene compared to this indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the faucet's still on with no plug in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, and water's heading their way—shocking negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene caught me off guard; it's full of hidden troubles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a simple kitchen could hold so many unexpected elements?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm stunned by how much is going wrong without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
